title: Sound On: Biden Emissions Order, WH Snubs Elon Musk (Radio)
itunes:title: Sound On: Biden Emissions Order, WH Snubs Elon Musk (Radio)
description:
Bloomberg Washington Correspondent Joe Mathieu delivers insight and analysis on the latest headlines from the White House and Capitol Hill, including conversations with influential lawmakers and key figures in politics and policy.


Guests:

Democratic Michigan Congressman Dan Kildee, Jack Fitzpatrick, Bloomberg Government reporter and Bloomberg politics contributors Rick Davis and Jeanne Sheehan Zaino.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
